text: They do not answer the phone at this location. It rings a few times than hangs up. I went to store to let them know and they didn't seem too concerned about it

text: It is an hour and a half before they close and when I call they hang up on me... Service is 50/50 chance of good and bad. The pizza and location are great but not sure about the customer service....

text: Ordered online the pizza was ready before the time listed. Only thing I did not like was you have to find your own order. Otherwise good pizza and the staff were nice.

text: Cloth Face CoveringsRequire the use of cloth face coverings among all staff, as feasible. Face coverings are most essential in times when physical distancing is difficult. Information should be provided to staff

text: I like their pizzas, better than others pizza places. Good and efficient service. Tuesday are very affordable for their specials on their large pizzas.

text: Had a terrible experience trying to place an order from this place tonight. Take your business elsewhere.

text: Great pizza when they take time to make it and read the entire order.. but 9 out of 10 times you have to tell them what your online order was when you get there because they seem to not have a ticket system like every other restaurant. Have …More

text: I walked in to get a pizza and I hear yelling from the back. text: It was my first time trying this pizza and the flavor was really good im really pleased. About construction wise I would like it to be more even and consistent. Customer service was ok we walked in and the bell rang and no body came out we …More

text: Ordered online because I was in a hurry.   When I got there it was made wrong and I had to stand around waiting to have it remade.

text: Pizza is good but this location has TERRIBLE customer service. All 3 people working were rude. The Broadway location is SO much better!!!

text: The manager has ocd about cleaning and the staff is always very nice and helpful plus I enjoy cooking my own pizza as I like it a little crispy  best pizza for the price

text: I really like this place, especially for those nights you have family or company over and don't feel like cooking.  I'm normally a 'meat lover's' type, but the chicken garlic pizza they have here is spectacular!

text: We always go in around 730pm. We know they close at 8pm but the boys always try to talk us out of getting pizza. Saying it takes 30 minutes to make hahah. Pretty funny but yeah bad service.
